overview:
My Major Company is a fan-funded record label that gives internet users and music fans the ability to invest in the career of the labelâ€™s artists, get involved at every stage of their development and retain a share of the profit generated by the release campaign following the bands launch.

Their unique business model has already been a huge success in France and the UK platform has launched with the first UK act raising the full Â£100K investment in just 5 days.

As with traditional record labels, there will be a fully strategised release campaign put in place for the acts and the artists album will be given every possible chance of success.

My Major Company also has its own A&R department responsible for finding and presenting the best new acts in the UK. The hugely experienced A&R team have spent months travelling the UK, seeing artists play and listening to demos to ensure that investors can be presented with only the very best unsigned artists.
